item.title: SE(3)-bi-equivariant Transformers for Point Cloud Assembly
item.description: SE(3)-bi-equivariant Transformers (BITR) revolutionizes point cloud assembly by guaranteeing robust alignment even with non-overlapping clouds, thanks to its unique equivariance properties.
